reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Emergency mobile medical nutrition clinics for the displaced in Al-Hodeidah Governorate (Phase V)

description.narrative: (86,000) IDPs received primary health care / (4200) children and women received therapeutic feeding services / (480) IDPs received immunization services / (12,000) women received reproductive health services / (8000) boys and girls obtained Medical services for children / 30,000 displaced people obtained awareness, health education and advancement in the camp environment / provision of dressing and follow-up services to a number of (8000) and reduction of complications and infections with the provision of medical referral service for (150) patients / continued provision of therapeutic and diagnostic services to 175 200 beneficiaries/ (15,000) cases received diagnosis and treatment services for epidemic diseases.
Providing health and nutritional services in Al Hudaydah Governorate and its districts
Saving life, maintaining its continuity, limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics, and securing basic emergency health and nutrition services for the displaced.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
